project.name: Taverna 2 Core Extensions (parent)
project.description: Functionality that users would regard as 'core' but which is actually implementented within plug-in packages. This includes the default set of dispatch layers (including the invoker!), basic reference schemes such as http URL, file and the inline 'value' reference types and the core set of activities provided by the myGrid team including the web service invoker, scripting support and similar.
